CustomField.formula: IF (OR(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"In Signatures"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"In Effect")),HYPERLINK("/_ui/core/email/author/EmailAuthor?p3_lkid="&Id&"&retURL=%2F"&Id&"&new_template=1&template_id="&$Setup.APT_R2T_System_Properties__c.APT_PBP_Email_Template_ID__c , IMAGE("/resource/APT_SendApplications", "Send Applications"), "_self"), NULL)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Send Applications and Questionnaires after sending LOI for Signatures
CustomField.label: Send Applications
